name: The Feudal in the Rye
description:
Open full screen to work correctly. Supports only 1920x1080 resolution

Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/the-feudal-in-the-rye

Description

Help the feudal lord buy back his castle! Build villagers’ houses, harvest taxes from them, hire villagers for your own protection, and defend your sources of income.

Controls

WASD - move

F - building interface

Left Click - for buttons
